title: Community Investment Tax Credit (CITC) 2024 Annual Report

abstracts.abstract: Report of the Executive Office of Housing and Livable Communities (pursuant to Section 6M(8)(c) of Chapter 62 of the General Laws and Section 38EE(c)(8) of the General Laws) submitting its Community Investment Tax Credit (CITC) 2024 annual legislative report
